about.description: Saves shell scripts that allow re-execute previous pytest runs to reproduce crashes or flaky tests
about.summary: Saves shell scripts that allow re-execute previous pytest runs to reproduce crashes or flaky tests

name: pytest-replay
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pytest-replay" %}
{% set version = "1.2.0" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash_value = "09d28df66bd2336e13909e7b6fc9ee63adb2c34cf5b4f2d601de445103f96aac" %}

package:
  name: '{{ name|lower }}'
  version: '{{ version }}'

source:
  fn: '{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz'
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  '{{ hash_type }}': '{{ hash_value }}'

build:
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
  noarch: python

requirements:
  build:
    - pip
    - python >=3.6
    - setuptools_scm    
  run:    
    - pytest >=3.0.0
    - python >=3.6

test:
  imports:
    - pytest_replay

about:
  home: https://github.com/ESSS/pytest-replay
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: 'LICENSE'
  summary: Saves shell scripts that allow re-execute previous pytest runs to reproduce crashes or flaky tests
  description: "Saves shell scripts that allow re-execute previous pytest runs to reproduce crashes or flaky tests"
  dev_url: https://github.com/ESSS/pytest-replay

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - nicoddemus
    - tadeu
    - prusse-martin
